Reviews.Title: “Good location, average cheap place”
Reviews.Author: SilviaOnTheRoad
Reviews.Content: spend days london budget hotel lord jim located 2 minutes walking earls court underground station convenient london city sightseeing staff friendly actually fitting double single bed bathroom medium size sink normal shower hair dryer surprised carpet hotel smell usual british surprise lift third floor luggage overall clean look details continental breakfast included coffee tea juices bread croissants toasted bread cheese butter marmalade cereals available buffet payed 46 pounds night weekend recommended short staying

Reviews.Title: “Small, Inexpensive, Convenient, Good”
Reviews.Author: David_The_Blue
Reviews.Content: feel hotel determined space adequate hotel tight bed table chair squeeze past bed table bathroom tight convenient earls court tube station pubs restaurants lounge downstairs roomy lounge read paper catch email etcetera wifi free clean night didnt spend time perfect

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need for a short break in London!”
Reviews.Author: ElizabethLuvsLondon
Reviews.Content: read reviews hotel wasnt expect pleasantly surprised staff friendly welcoming paid single shared bathroom ensuite added bonus towels teacoffee hairdryer phone nice tv etc requested newly refurbished met customers nicely decorated warm cosy actually didnt time eat breakfast getting late basic variety choose location literally round corner earls court tube station hotels nice quiet street street negative lift broken walk 4 flights stairs wasnt bothered overall friendly goodvalue money hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: ageorgiou
Reviews.Content: booked minute business trip london booked lord jim hotel location staff friendly upgraded free charge arrived hotel clean convinient location close restaurants tube stations value money defenately stay future

Reviews.Title: “The Little Gem Lord Jim”

Reviews.Content: arrived lord jim greeted warmly receptionist tried upgrade female decided share bathroom unfortunately wasnt available 3 nights nice gesture happy share bathroom booked regardless paid mere â£40 night location bargain literally minute walk earls court tube station kensington lovely lot reviews moaning size forth yes london cheap characteristic town houses bed breakfasts affluent believe charm personally clean nice little extras shampoo conditioner soap stay cleaned nicely own stuff id left tidied nice warm found hotel appealing look including pretty outside lobby putting decorations christmas living nice breakfast nice toast served fast morning nice choices fresh fruit yoghurts cheese pastries juice nice cold enjoyed staying staying week london little hotel price service little extras price stay hotel london stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location, but tiny, smelly room”
Reviews.Author: WheelyBag
Reviews.Content: literally sleep hotel lord jim alright suitcase constantly stumbling bathroom sink bed bad suppose cramped bathroom smelled heaven clean nonetheless extremely hot summer couldnt sleep comfortably despite 10 degrees cooler outside wear earplugs hear person cough thats cramped underwhelming experience thats london hotels

Reviews.Title: “central location, rooms small, staff very helpful”
Reviews.Author: LondonMags40
Reviews.Content: hi stayed hotel friends weekend hotel located near shops bars underground etc basic breakfast poor compared previous basic hotels stayed night receptionist omar helpful assistance deal customers unfair imagine owners dont care hotel reasonably cheap cheerful hotel ok base nights thats
